CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 31, 1959, pg. A2, reads: "Plan Renewal Drive - The NAACP Fall Membership REnewal Membership Drive got under way on Monday night as a group of workers met at the Squirrel Hill home of Mrs. Mina Kavaler, chairman of the drive. Left to right are: Mrs. Mina Kavaler, Charles Hoston, Mrs. Lorenda Tyler, Willis Walker, Mrs. Barbara Murphy, Mrs. Anna Mae English, Janson Kelly, Mrs. Dorothy Williams, Miss Jewel Hairston, Miss Alvinia Holt and Mrs. Annabelle Jefferson.  Workers hope to obtain 1,000 memberships before the end of the year, and plan to use techniques used successfully by the United Jewish Fund campaigns. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of NAACP membership drive workers, from left: Mina Kavaler, Charles Hoston, Lorenda Tyler, Willis Walker, Barbara Murphy, Anna Mae English, Janson Kelly, Dorothy Williams, Jewel Hairston, Alvinia Holt, and Annabelle Jefferson, gathered in home of Mina Kavaler, Squirrel Hill, another version
